Title: The Devil Wears Prada
Overview: Andy moves to New York to work in the fashion industry. Her boss is extremely demanding, cruel and won't let her succeed if she doesn't fit into the high class elegant look of their magazine.
Tagline: Meet Andy Sachs. A million girls would kill to have her job. She's not one of them.
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Dune Entertainment, Major Studio Partners, Peninsula Films, Fox 2000 Pictures
Cast: Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Emily Blunt
clean_text: devil wear prada andy move new york work fashion industry boss extremely demanding cruel will not let succeed not fit high class elegant look magazine meet andy sachs million girl kill job s one comedy drama romance david frankel meryl streep anne hathaway emily blunt 2006
